verses.verse: "Do you <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H6256>time<s%> when the <S%H5553>mountain<s%> <S%H3277>goats<s%> give <S%H3205>birth?<s%> Do you <S%H8104>watch<s%> when the <S%H355>doe<s%> bears <S%H2342>fawns?<s%>
Can you <S%H5608>number<s%> the <S%H3391>months<s%> that they <S%H4390>fulfill?<s%> Or <S%H4390>do<s%> you <S%H3045>know<s%> the time when they give <S%H6256>birth?<s%>
They <S%H3766>bow<s%> <S%H6398>themselves,<s%> they bring forth their <S%H3206>young,<s%> they <S%H7971>end<s%> their labor <S%H2256>pains.<s%>
Their young <S%H1121>ones<s%> become <S%H2492>strong.<s%> They grow <S%H7235>up<s%> in the open <S%H1250>field.<s%> They go <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and <S%H7725>don't<s%> return again.
"Who has <S%H7971>set<s%> the wild <S%H6501>donkey<s%> <S%H2670>free?<s%> Or who has <S%H6605>loosened<s%> the <S%H4147>bonds<s%> of the swift <S%H6171>donkey,<s%>
Whose <S%H1004>home<s%> I have <S%H7760>made<s%> the <S%H6160>wilderness,<s%> and the <S%H4420>salt<s%> land his dwelling <S%H4908>place?<s%>
He <S%H7832>scorns<s%> the <S%H1995>tumult<s%> of the <S%H7151>city,<s%> neither does he <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H8663>shouting<s%> of the <S%H5065>driver.<s%>
The <S%H3491>range<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> is his <S%H4829>pasture,<s%> He <S%H1875>searches<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> every green <S%H3387>thing.<s%>
"Will the wild <S%H7214>ox<s%> be <S%H14>content<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3885>you?<s%> Or will he stay by your feeding <S%H18>trough?<s%>
Can you <S%H7194>hold<s%> the wild <S%H7214>ox<s%> in the <S%H8525>furrow<s%> with his <S%H5688>harness?<s%> Or will he <S%H7702>till<s%> the <S%H6010>valleys<s%> after <S%H310>you?<s%>
Will you <S%H982>trust<s%> <S%H3581>him,<s%> because his strength is <S%H7227>great?<s%> Or will you <S%H5800>leave<s%> to him your <S%H3018>labor?<s%>
Will you <S%H539>confide<s%> in <S%H7725>him,<s%> that he will bring home your <S%H2233>seed,<s%> and <S%H622>gather<s%> the grain of your threshing <S%H1637>floor?<s%>
"The <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the <S%H5965>ostrich<s%> wave <S%H7443>proudly;<s%> but are they the <S%H84>feathers<s%> and <S%H2624>plumage<s%> of <S%H5133>love?<s%>
For she <S%H5800>leaves<s%> her <S%H1000>eggs<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H2552>warms<s%> them in the <S%H6083>dust,<s%>
and <S%H7911>forgets<s%> that the <S%H7272>foot<s%> may <S%H2115>crush<s%> <S%H7704>them,<s%> or that the wild <S%H2416>animal<s%> may trample <S%H1758>them.<s%>
She deals <S%H7188>harshly<s%> with her young <S%H1121>ones,<s%> as if they were <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3018>hers.<s%> Though her labor is in <S%H7385>vain,<s%> she is without <S%H6343>fear,<s%>
because <S%H433>God<s%> has <S%H5382>deprived<s%> her of <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> neither has he <S%H2505>imparted<s%> to her <S%H998>understanding.<s%>
<S%H6256>When<s%> she lifts <S%H4754>up<s%> herself on <S%H4791>high,<s%> she <S%H7832>scorns<s%> the <S%H5483>horse<s%> and his <S%H7392>rider.<s%>
"Have you <S%H5414>given<s%> the <S%H5483>horse<s%> <S%H1369>might?<s%> Have you <S%H3847>clothed<s%> his <S%H6677>neck<s%> with a quivering <S%H7483>mane?<s%>
Have you made him to <S%H7493>leap<s%> as a <S%H697>locust?<s%> The <S%H1935>glory<s%> of his <S%H5170>snorting<s%> is <S%H367>awesome.<s%>
He <S%H2658>paws<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley,<s%> and <S%H7797>rejoices<s%> in his <S%H3581>strength.<s%> He goes <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> the armed <S%H5402>men.<s%>
He <S%H7832>mocks<s%> at <S%H6343>fear,<s%> and is not <S%H2865>dismayed,<s%> neither does he turn <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>
The <S%H827>quiver<s%> <S%H7439>rattles<s%> against <S%H3851>him,<s%> the flashing <S%H2595>spear<s%> and the <S%H3591>javelin.<s%>
He <S%H1572>eats<s%> up the <S%H776>ground<s%> with <S%H7494>fierceness<s%> and <S%H7267>rage,<s%> neither does he stand <S%H539>still<s%> at the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet.<s%>

As often as the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> <S%H1767>sounds<s%> he <S%H559>snorts,<s%> <S%H1889><s%> 'Aha!' <S%H1889><s%> He <S%H7306>smells<s%> the <S%H4421>battle<s%> afar <S%H7350>off,<s%> the <S%H7482>thunder<s%> of the <S%H8269>captains,<s%> and the <S%H8643>shouting.<s%>
"Is it by your <S%H998>wisdom<s%> that the <S%H5322>hawk<s%> <S%H82>soars,<s%> and <S%H6566>stretches<s%> her <S%H3671>wings<s%> toward the <S%H8486>south?<s%>
Is it at your <S%H6310>command<s%> that the <S%H5404>eagle<s%> mounts <S%H1361>up,<s%> and <S%H7311>makes<s%> his <S%H7064>nest<s%> on <S%H7311>high?<s%>
On the <S%H5553>cliff<s%> he <S%H7931>dwells,<s%> and makes his <S%H3885>home,<s%> on the <S%H5553>point<s%> of the <S%H8127>cliff,<s%> and the <S%H4686>stronghold.<s%>
From there he <S%H2658>spies<s%> out the <S%H400>prey.<s%> His <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H5027>see<s%> it afar <S%H7350>off.<s%>
His young <S%H667>ones<s%> also suck <S%H5966>up<s%> <S%H1818>blood.<s%> Where the <S%H2491>slain<s%> <S%H1931>are,<s%> there he is."
